My BF was concerned there wouldn't be enough boom, he was pleasantly surprised.
92.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

93.author: RonInTexas
93.review:
I purchased this model because Samsung reported that it worked with MLB.TV, Hulu and Netflix. This was not correct - MLB.TV was removed from the app list with the update provided from Samsung (MLB.TV requires an update to work). It produces good sound, however, using the optical cable for TV you lose the surround sound speakers (they only work for DVD/BluRays).

I am disappointed that I still have to use my XBox 360 for MLB.TV, but happy otherwise.
93.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

94.author: Whiskey13
94.review: This system interferes with my wifi, dumping all of my devices off wifi when it is on. Netflix picture gets blurry off and on every 5 minutes. Freezes up when I try to do an update. I have spent over 4 hours trying to figure this out and still has all the same problems. Samsung service ticket process is ridiculous! Spent 40 minutes filling that out! And yes, I already worked with my iSP to make sure that is working properly, and it is.
94.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

95.author: Disappointed
95.review_title: Missing some features I was expecting
95.review: The rear speakers are wireless in that they are not connected to the DVD player, however they have wires running between the 2 rear speakers and a wireless receiver. And that comes with yet another power cord! Might as well just run speaker cable, it is easier to route and hide! There is no web browser. And the Samsung Apps/channels are not available. Instead it has OperaTV! Collection of useless content.
95.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

96.author: Jake
96.review: The product was very easy to set up and install. I have never had wireless back speakers before but these speakers work well. Sound quality is really quite good and the video on streaming is high quality. DVDs play as you would expect with no problems so far. This was a modest upgrade from my previous Sony 3100 system which had some major problems and had to be returned. Only a few dollars more but much improved performance from the SONY.
96.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

97.author: glennie
97.review: This system is pretty good. My biggest complaint was with the knowledge level of store personnel. I made three round trips to the store to get a working system. In fact, I went to a competitor's store to finally resolve my problem; I was ready to return this system. My previous TV and home theater system came from Best Buy so i thought they should be familiar with what I had. The wireless receiver for the rear speakers is a nice thought that saves some wire run around my walls.
97.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

98.author: Darkwing
98.review_title: Sound is perfect for my needs
98.review: Purchased this product a few years ago and it had to get shipped out to get repaired for a bad fan 2 times. When it went bad the 3rd time they replaced it. Best Buy gave me all my amount from original purchase and was able to get same product at a cheaper price which helped to buy a new service plan. The newer system is working great!!! Thanks to Best Buy for working with me on the replacement
98.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

99.author: tjbryan
99.review_title: Surprised by how much I like it.
99.review: We got this as an open box item so I was a little skeptical about the purchase, but we are very happy with it. The surround sound is really great. Not overbearing and I don't feel like i only hear the base like I did with our last system. It works seamlessly with our TV, cable, firestick and PS4. The only negative I had is that I had to figure out how to update the device within the first few days because it would only play select DVD's.
99.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

100.author: LilyP
100.review_title: Great start for a home theater
100.review: We just started getting our home theater up and running. It set up quite easily with our Epson Home Cinema 2045 projector. The biggest pain with setting it up was the wires. The sound quality is great in my opinion. My main concern was how it would pair with the projector and I haven't had any problems on that part. The 3D compatibility is great. I have the Sony Active 3D glasses and they all worked well together. Yes, 20 different brands.
100.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

101.author: Bobby
101.review: There was really not much choices at Best Buy for an HTIB. So ended up purchasing Samsung. System worked great and synced up nicely with my LG TV. I originally had an LG HTIB before where the Blu-Ray player (built in the receiver) died so had to get a replacement. Can't just buy the player/receiver so had to buy the whole HTIB system again. The Samsung actually was a LOT better than my LG. So I ended up with a better system which worked out it pretty good at the end.
101.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

102.author: JTfromSA
102.review:
Bought the HT-J5500W today and its just not what I hoped for. The speakers aren't too bad but the rear "wireless" is not worth it. Tried a few movies but they dont work. They test just fine but no sound while watching a movie. 
Then theres the volume. I'm watching a movie and can't turn the volume up or down. The display just says not available. It only seems to work while I have the FM tuner going.
102.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

103.author: shar
103.review: Our only downfall was wired. We would have preferred wireless. However the selection and price were a disappointment. We went to the store in Dover to learn a little more but that was a big mistake. The person explaining the systems to us must have been new and was very confused. We came home and did our homework and chose this one. Our home was already wired for our old one so this wasn't a big deal.
103.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

104.author: vpeeler
104.review_title: Great sound out of a little box
104.review: I got this because the sound from the my flat screen tv is not so good. I wanted something that would make the sound easier to hear and understand, and this does that at a small price. I was considering another Bose, but this was just right for the space. My only issue is the back surround speakers do not produce hardly any sound, but for this small room, it really didn't matter.
104.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

105.author: HZAM
105.review:
This was my first HT purchase and i am satisfied with it. It was easy to install and the sound is good. Im not a very sound enthusiast so I cant comment on that, but it was a great upgrade from my Tv sound. The Blue ray is also good and I like the clean interface it has.

An advice, to check the sound system, get a Blue Ray Disc. Not all the speakers work when you are streaming. I first thought that the system was faulty but worked perfectly with the blue ray.
105.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

106.author: GaryF
106.review: Bought this to replace a Sony home theater system that only had one audio channel still working. The old Sony had a 5 disc DVD changer which we rarely used so the BluRay on this was a good upgrade. The sound is even better than the old Sony was (which was good) and the wireless rear surround speakers (wired to rear sound module, wireless to main unit) sound awesome.
106.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

107.author: Kjlexo
107.review: I purchased originally because I thought that the speakers were wireless. Turns out only the back speakers are wireless and technically they are not because they are required to be plugged into a powersource that looks like a modem. All the front speakers plug into the blue ray players. So not exactly what I wanted. I am using it with a projector so it is better then the speakers on the projector, but was not exactly what I thought it was.
107.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

108.author: Rece12
108.review: Purchased this surround sound over a month ago. Had all the wires connected correctly, but it still doesn't work. went back to the store to let them know. the associate told me how to resolve / make the unit work. went home and did exactly as he said, but it still did not work. now I feel like I'm stuck with a product that doesn't work.... apparently it is not user friendly
108.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

109.author: Nightforce2
109.review:
Everything worked fine upon installation. After everything was installed and updated, playef a 4K movie and tried pausing the movie and then it happened.

We had a problem with the Blu-ray player pausing the movie through this device. It would continue playing about 2 secs everytime even after hitting pause again. Updated to the latest update, which is 1008. Still the same issue.

Other then this issue the device works as advertised.
109.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

110.author: justoldmack
110.review_title: OK for easy-to-please folks like me
110.review: Best Buy does not sell an amplified FM antenna that will plug into this system; the one they sell has a plug too fat to fit when the RCA or digital optical cable is plugged in even though the Best Buy guru picked it out, suggested it, took it back past the 15 days and could only get a gift card, no refund available. But, the sound system is OK, works best with the optic cable even though it is not "suggested". The manual accompanying it is substandard.
110.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

111.author: Gunny
111.review: Daniel, who assisted me in my purchase,was absolutely amazing. He was very knowledgeable and helpful in my selecting the right product. The entire sound system from speakers to receiver to dvd player are far more than I expected. It was easy but a bit time consuming to set up but well worth the effort. Many thanks to Dan and his expert assistance and advice.
111.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

112.author: Littsx3
112.review: We purchased this to use along with a home movie projector. I originally had reservations that the sound would carry in an outdoor setting, but honestly......we had to end up turning it down, and worried that the volume was too loud. LoL ! Didn't want to disturb the neighbors. Great Quality ! Only complaint is that when watching regular TV/satellite .....the rear speakers do not work almost all of the time !
112.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

113.author: Matt
113.review: Bought this to be an upgrade from the standard tv speakers. They are much better from factory, but nowhere as good as a high end system. Only real complaints are that while letting my roku tv control the audio signal I can't change the to Bluetooth input. The other is there constantly seems to be a hissing or static coming from the rear speakers, probably because they are wireless
113.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

114.author: BobK
114.review_title: Great sound system for the money.
114.review:
This sound system flawlessly works with our new Samsung Series 8 55" Smart $K Ultra HD TV.

All functions can be used with the TV smart remote (provided you use the fiber optic output from the TV to the sound system.

I would give it 5 stars if the audio quality were lettle better, but for $400 it's very good and we're happy we purchased it with our new TV.
114.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

115.author: emco1977
115.review: We own a 70 inch Samsung so we thought we would trade in our Sony system for a Samsung to match our TV. After spending 3 hours on the phone with Samsung and double, triple, quadruple checking connections, and reconfiguring our TV and HTS 4 times, we still could not get the system to work. We are boxing the thing up and taking it back! Poor ridiculousness!
115.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

116.author: Kodbce27
116.review: I bought this home sound for my friend on Christmas as a gift. We installed it and play some movies Christmas Day. The sound was great. It sounded as if you were at the movie theater. The boom box is really good. My friend loved and he is very happy with it. The price was also very good. It is not wireless speakers wise but you can connect your cell or computer through the Bluetooth.
116.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

117.author: thorn3x3
117.review: This product is good for small living rooms. Good power and features, easy installation. Don't expect high end audio from this unit as that it not what it is designed for. It is designed to be cost effective, yet provide a good listening experience. The rear speakers are powered by an RF receiver, eliminating the need to route wires across your floor. All in all, a good product that is cost effective, sounds good and is easy to install.
117.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

118.author: good
118.review: I don't like samsung but... I bought this for my spouse since he had the note 8 and we needed a theater home system. Its awesome so far, it's in our living room mounted around 25 ft x 18ft , 10ft celing. Bass his great with this room as well, a bit impressive I might add....:) good by over all!
118.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

119.author: CabMan
119.review: I love my Samsung TV ! However they have a long way to go with their audio. This unit sounded incredibly thin , sub sucks .. No Power! I returned it next day and bought the Samsung sound bar with wireless sub. A Little better but not much. I replaced a Sony sound bar with these and the Sony is now in my master bedroom and it still sounds better than these. I read reviews that stated " Thunderous Base " from this unit .I disagree .
119.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

120.author: everard
120.review:
I am using Samsung TV, so bought the same home theater system for compatibility.
Of course, they are matched totally well, while TV is on and off, automatically it's on and off too.
Also, working well independently for FM or blue tooth connection with cell phone.
First I purchased 320w sound bar but this home theater is much better than that.
Completely satisfied with it.
120.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

121.author: dsjoyce
121.review_title: Nice surround system for smaller rooms.
121.review: Overall pretty good sound quality even at louder volumes. Takes a little bit of reading and experimenting if you want to get good surround sound for music but DVD's sound great. Rear "wireless" speakers are actually wired to a separate unit but it still eliminates the need to run a cable through or under a room to set up the rear.
121.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

122.author: Robi
122.review: I purchase a 55 inches RCA TV 3 month ago did not check the TV inside of the box because the box was not damage I was waiting to move to my new home when in did open the box the TV was damage took it back to the store and they told me they could not do anything I left the TV in the store and I lost $500.00. Had to buy another TV, I had spend over $3000, in best buy inn the last 4 month, I will not buy any more in best buy.
122.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

123.author: Mattm
123.review: They system is super simple to set up and the sound quality is decent for my living room. The only down side I've found if that sometimes the rear speakers don't work or it will mix up the speaker locations. But doing a simple speaker sound check usually solves the problem pretty quick. Over all I'm very satisfied for the product for the price.
123.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

124.author: jihernandez7
124.review: Very nice home theatre design, but unfortunately, the rear receiver was defective and could not transmit the signal to the rear speakers. I called samsung who couldn't even fix it... I had to send it back which would take weeks to fix or return it to the store. I chose option 2 and got my refund. To bad since its a nice home theatre.
124.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

125.author: southpaw
125.review: I'm disappointed in Samsung with this version of the system. I purchased this one (model HT J5500) to replace the same system (model HT F5500) I had purchased two years ago. They have deleted so many sound options and apps and the web browser that makes this thing basically a blue ray player. You would think newer versions would offer more features not less.
125.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

126.author: Oldman
126.review_title: Great sound from something so small...
126.review: I was very skeptical about this item. Just the size of it was not convincing. But was I very wrong, took it home hooked it up. And to my surprise, this little sucker sounded very nice. I mean, the deep bass it generated from a small subwoofer, and the surround sound was clear and very loud. I was blown away by this little giant. And I love great sound and bass, I love it, it makes movie night that much better.
126.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

127.author: Liborio
127.review: I bought this for a friend of mine who wanted a surround system that would blend into the room and show no cables. I installed this system at her home and was surprised by the quality of the sound especially the imaging which compares well with my home system which cost significantly more. It has good bass response , better than I expected. Overall a great little system .
127.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

128.author: cloudnine228
128.review: I purchased this because my surround sound that I had for 8 years was making noises. We bought this in hopes that it would sound a lot like the Samsung surround sound we have now. I was less than impressed with this when I hooked everything up! I returned it and cleaned up my old one and cant get over how much better my old one sounds. I will keep looking for a better quality surround sound for the time being.
128.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

129.author: Jagpate
129.review_title: System is good if you intend to have in small room
129.review:
System is easy to setup. It has good bad as well as center channel speaker
Rear/surround sound speake is now as effective as it should be

I got open box for $230 so it not bad for this price

I was debating between the HTIB and sound bar. I choose this over sound bar because I do not have problem of having rear speakers
129.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

130.author: Robert
130.review: The sound is not phenomenal but it is much better than the TV speakers. It is slightly lacking in all the newer audio modes such as Atmos. The all in one nature paired up with my Samsung TV and the ARC and I can get my TV sound going through the surround without any extra cabling. All in all it works very well with the Samsung TV and is sufficient for my needs in the room I chose to use it in.
130.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

131.author: Steven
131.review: I had this system for a little over a year. The system was a good solution for an in the box home theater system. Good accurate sound and medium amount of bass. The receiver is no longer playing through the center speaker and the subwoofer conveniently a week outside of the year warranty. I was expecting more longevity from Samsung.
131.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

132.author: Gabriels00
132.review_title: There is always room for improvement
132.review: Sounds good, the system could respond a little faster to the remote, it sort of hesitates when presing the buttons, you kinda have to wait for it, it is for a split second but you can feel the drag. Also the RF signal from the remote seems to be not as good as i would have thought. A 2015 RF signal system has to work flawlessly no excuses.
132.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

133.author: bowtietoy85
133.review: I've had for about six months I I am very unhappy with this. I can't get on YouTube or Netflix because the system time is updating. Occasionally when I watch a movie the sound works, except for the dialog. I got this because I have had really good luck with Samsung products before, but this and the tv I bought shortly afterward have continued to let me down. Very frustrating
133.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

134.author: ketoglenn
134.review: This is the 2nd of these systems that I've purchased. The first I put out in my garage to have as a stereo and occasional netflix streaming while working on cars since I have a 42inch TV out there. I liked it so much I got another for in our living room. Easy to use and sounds great!
134.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

135.author: Remo
135.review: Excellent s\ound and bass from such a small unit. Fills the whole house with sound when playing music and shakes stuff off of the dresser. Wish it could be a little more hard hitting when watching movies, but that might be my movie quality sometimes. Some movies really engross you within the sound
135.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

136.author: WELO
136.review: I use it for our bedroom sound system. So far the sound is great, ability to use other apps such as Pandora, netfix, etc are great too. 4 out of 5 because there is not touch bottoms on the actual unit- remote control only- without the remote control, you cannot access any features, other than on/off. I thin they should have at least a up/down & Select bottom to maneuver thru the options manually
136.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

137.author: BWISE4U
137.review:
I have had this now for a little over a month...
Great sound so far with blu ray and cd playing. Only reason I haven't given it a 5 rating is when you put in a disc there's no sound right away and when you try the volume up or down buttons the info on the player says "not available" you have to use the function button and go from movie through the different options back to movie and then you get sound
137.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

138.author: Saintswinsb44
138.review_title: Great sound. Easily fills the air in the man cave.
138.review: Pleasantly surprised with the easy set up and performance of the system. It really sounds great when you are playing Blu Ray discs. The speakers put out a crisp and clear sound throughout the room. The only semi-con is that the rear speakers still have wires. We overcame that during the setup by tucking them under a runner on the bar. Other than that this is a great unit at a fair price.
138.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

139.author: John
139.review_title: Great Sound, No HDMI Inputs for Gaming
139.review: The Sound on the system is excellent, however, do not purchase if your plan is to plug your gaming system(s) into it. It only has a single HDMI out slot, and a digital sound port. The digital sound port when in use, only utilizes the front 3 speakers and the subwoofer, not giving you the true surround sound. Best bet is to search for a system that has multiple cdmi ports.
139.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

140.author: ses0506
140.review: Overall satisfied. I had to return the first system, worked through all the trouble shooting, never could get the left front speaker to work. It was a real pain, two days messing with it before giving up. The second system works fine. If I had unlimited money I would have a full component system and go all out, but for the price this is a relatively good sounding system.
140.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

141.author: Lemar214
141.review: Bought this to enhance my tv ahow and movie watching experience. It does everything I need it to do. I found this out when I kept looking behind me for a week after installation. Kept hearing noises. Well, it was the sound effects from the system lol. Its not like a legitimate movie theater system but its a close second. Also, don't expect to add Kodi.
141.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

142.author: Goodie
142.review: Easy hook up and sounded great for the first 2 months. After that either I had trouble with the sound on the blu-ray or the sound while watching DirecTV. Now it doesn’t work at all while watching DirecTV only Blu-ray. What a waste of money. Wish I had just bought a sound bar and a separate Blu-ray.
142.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

143.author: tm64512
143.review: The first system I bought, the player quit playing my Blu-ray disks after just 41/2 months. Bought the second because I didn't want to be without while the first was sent in for repair. Main reason I bought it was the wireless rear speakers. The speakers that come with it are tinny so I use my JVC speakers from my 10 yr old DVD system. We'll see about this one.
143.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

144.author: jeezyfosheezy
144.review: I purchased this after a soundbar did not feet my needs. This system is basically all in one. It can play blurays and do TV apps. You can connect your phone via bluetooth and play music (perfect for parties). One of the best features is that the rear 2 speakers have their own wireless receiver so that you dont need to run cables from your tv to the rear speakers.
144.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

145.author: Olly
145.review:
Sound is great, remote rear speakers stay connected (unlike my last set of LG's) and provide decent surround sound. Sub gives a good rumble too.

Shame the LCD does not show what audio its processing (e.g. DTS 3/2.1, DD 3/2.1 etc.).

If you just want something easy to setup with wireless surround rear speakers that provides decent sound, it's a good choice.
145.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

146.author: WildWill
146.review_title: Nice features and sound for decent price
146.review: The unit sounds good and has great features. The rear speakers are Bluetooth, but the rear channel receiver is the only part of that is wireless - rear speakers have to be wired to it. Speaker wire is a little thin also. Other than that, it is pretty decent for the price. Note: Need HDMI and optic audio cable to connect to TV.
146.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

147.author: corey
147.review: Upon purchasing the unit I had to return it just a week later for a faulty dvd player. The new one is working as it should. The sound is not the best. Only time you ever hear anything out of the rear speakers is if the volume is way up and only during a movie. Playing the radio is not even possible. The antenna provided won't even pick up local channels.
147.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

148.author: COgooner
148.review: I bought this unit as a replacement from my old Samsung multi-DVD surround sound system. The sound quality is fantastic. The sub-woofer produces rich, deep basses and the remote rear speakers are great too (although make sure that you have an electric outlet close to where you want the speakers. Highly recommended for the price.
148.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

149.author: AxlineM
149.review: The sound quality is great just had a really hard time figuring out how to hook it up. The wireless speakers (which aren't wireless) don't come with instructions for the wireless receiver. Took a good hour to finally get it to work. I would recommend it but I would have to tell you how to get the wireless receiver to work.
149.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

150.author: rootman1987
150.review: We bought this on a whim, and upon setup found it difficult to use, the streaming was just awful, and the bluetooth lag was so bad, we were unable to get it to sync up with the video. Returned immediately, and bought a much cheaper Onkyo that blew this thing out of the water.
150.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

151.author: BigTEXEP
151.review: Samsung always makes great products and this is no exception. The Blu-Ray playback works flawlessly and the sound system is amazing. I especially love the fact that it connects to the Internet Wireless and has all the Internet Apps you could want like Netflix, Vudu, and YouTube. It will definitely complete your home theater. Great Purchase!!!
151.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

152.author: Ralph
152.review: We replaced a home theater (multi disc) unit that had to be 15 years old. We don't watch many discs. This seemed like a complete easy unit and turned out to be just that. Works well. Can't really hear the surround speakers doing much but they do work and that may just be the movie.
152.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

153.author: k3emo73
153.review: This entertainment system does some unexpected things. When I turn on my tv this thing will come on by itself. It turns my TV speakers off. I then have to use my TV menu to turn them back on. I think Samsung has infected my Visio TV. Right now I leave it unplugged until I am going to use it. Will get the Geek Squad to check it out after the Holidays.
153.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

154.author: Karen
154.review: unfortunately, we are still in process of rebuild after Hurricane Harvey and are not ready to install the sound system. Have been very satisfied with other Samsung products I've purchased. Made my selection based on that factor, from surveys I read and price Am looking forward to setting it up, hopefully, very soon
154.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

155.author: Gary186253
155.review: This is an ok sound system. Bought it as an open box after it was on sale. I prefered my Sony system I had before because unlike it, the Samsung system is not able to play left and right sound through the surround speakers so they don't always play sound. It is nice though not having to wire the surround speakers to the receiver.
155.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

156.author: Frank
156.review: I already own the 7.1 version of this home theater system and after 4 years it's still going strong. So when I needed a new one for a smaller room I decided to go with this one. The sound is amazing and the ease of the wireless rear speakers makes it a great choice.
156.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

157.author: Ejharris
157.review: The system itself is great , yet I’m a little bothered by the functionality of it. When I️ power up my tv it automatically comes on which is great at times but a nuisance at others. I’ve yet to get the wireless speakers to act correctly. I️ got this item open box though for a great price so i wouldn’t dare complain.
157.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

158.author: sherlock
158.review: After reviewing several home theater sound systems, both at Best Buy and at other stores (online & i person) & talking to personnel at Best Buy sales personnel, based in the advice/information received from Best Buy personnel, I decided to buy this Samsung system to go with my Samsung SmartTV. A++++++++++++ all around
158.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

159.author: MikeyBest
159.review:
Got this to replace my old Panasonic system. It was 7.1. However this is 5.1. So not as good. Those were too expensive now. 
Got this one as it matches my Samsung tv. The bass ain't all that great, however for the money this one has good sound and Wi-Fi too.
The Netflix and YouTube work well. The "wireless" rear speakers are good too, less wires.
159.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

160.author: Pavan
160.review: It has only one HDMI however if you tv has HDMI ARC, this will be enough as you can connect all your devices to the tv and the tv passes sound through. Make sure to select bitstream on your tv to get the best surround sound channels.
160.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

161.author: K3ntuckyWindage
161.review: The depths of the sound were simply not strong enough to be noticeable. The rear satellite speakers although a good design and easy to set up were non existent even after changing the rear surround configuration to be as loud as possible. Unfortunately I was displeased and returned the item for the Polk SB1+.
161.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

162.author: Snuffy
162.review: I don't hear all that well, so this system is great for me. The speaker set up works so well that I can actually hear people talking louder like they are separate from other louder sounds. which is what I've been needing for a long time. Love it.
162.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

163.author: RLHtravel
163.review: I purchased this Amp/Receiver for one reason. SIZE. I am using this in my class C RV motor home. I needed a 120 volt system instead of a small 12 volt system that I replaced this system. I love the FM receiver and the Blue tooth connection. I am also playing 377 FLAC CD albums on a USB drive and the sound is fantastic.
163.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

164.author: MegC
164.review: I went in for a soundbar and walked out with this. Alot more system for basically the same price, PLUS a 3D bluray player? Perfect, however getting it to work with the TV was not easy, I followed the very simple directions but still ended having to buy an optical cord to get it to work with my cable. :/
164.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

165.author: Pavan
165.review: This unit comes with an ARC which thankfully can return audio from TV. All other devices connected to the TV, the TV can be used as pass through. Make sure you choose bitstream in your TV output for the Samsung player to play the sound in 5.1
165.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

166.author: Opie773
166.review: Not a bad system for the price. Installation was a breeze, except I was missing a power cord for the rear wireless speaker module. Don't expect big sound from this system, but if you're balling on a budget, this is a good system for you.
166.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

167.author: Samsun
167.review: 45 days after I bought the blue ray DVD player, it started to not play regular disks. Of course Best Buy only gives you a 15 day time limit to bring something back. I had to send the DVD player off to have samsung do a maintenance check. 10 to 15 days i Have lost the unit. For a 300.00 dollar player I expected a lot better built player.
167.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

168.author: Mannyman
168.review: This is a decent system for entry level surround sound. It matches up with my Samsung TV well. I have this in a relatively small location so it is perfect for what I want. It was easy to set up. If you are a serious audiophile or have a medium to large room you probably need something with more speakers and more power.
168.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

169.author: Samsung
169.review: I bought the system and was unpacking it and it had no speaker wires in the box so I had to take it back and exchange for one that did because it has special plugs for the receiver. Great system, but cheap quality so definitely buy the service plan , as it will surely die within the 4-year period and without the plan, you will be dead in the water.
169.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

170.author: Smogdrummer
170.review: So far I am pleased with this home theater system. It sounds good, picture is nice, and the anynet controls work well with my Samsung tv for integrated controlling. The only thing that kept me from 5 stars is that I wish the software itself was a little different and that eq could be,changed from any source as opposed to only in bluray/DVD mode.
170.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

171.author: Bill
171.review: This system is very good. A few things to know. The back speakers are not exactly wireless and I could not get th HDMI ARC to work with my LG TV. Using an optical cable works fine. Some reviews complain that the back speakers won't work. If this happen, just read the manual. The advice it gives works.
171.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

172.author: Yellowsubmarine
172.review:
I own 3 of these in different rooms and would have given it 5 stars except the eject function takes WAYY too long to open. I hit it nothing happened so I hit it again and again. It open then I went to put disc in and it decided to catch up and went to close by itself scratching the disc.
So hit eject and WAIT is my advice.
172.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

173.author: Karma
173.review:
First, This is a great short term option but it'd be smart to invest in the larger items that aren't all in one package deal as they will last longer and overall have better quality.
Second, can anybody confirm that all this can or can't work with a receiver? Haven't tried it yet.
173.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

174.author: LaRayna
174.review:
Good system except when you are playing CDs...it doesnt auto start again, you have to go and push play again when the CD ends...
The surround wirless speakers only play when you are watching a DVD
Samsung is very impressive all the time, this one surprised me, as I am normally very impressed.
174.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

175.author: mars
175.review: It's more than I thought it would be. My old system had an FM tuner included, I did not see it listed in the features for this system, but was pleasantly surprised when searching the functions and there it was! And the sound is phenomenal! Very happy with my new system!
175.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

176.author: vic1tor2flores3
176.review: I am very lucky to have this product. amazing sound for the price. but I feel lucky to have this system. because I had insurance on my old surround sound system. and after two years on the old one it busted. but best buy took care of it, with my insurance. good job best buy!!
176.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

177.author: Snottysmom
177.review_title: Great sound system and blu-ray player
177.review: Store associate was very knowledgeable and guided me through the system that was exactly what I wanted. He assisted with what I would need for the installation and the setup was easy. It has amazing sound and I'm not inundated with a bunch of wiring.
177.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

178.author: shopper90
178.review: It is a good surround sound and would recommend it to other people however there is one problem. The rear speakers are advertised as wireless but that is not completely true. While they are separate from the Blu-ray player they still have to be wired into a receiver.
178.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

179.author: Margo
179.review: Great sound just not enough bass for me. Great product for the purchase. I have a deftech w studio for my living room... Love that bass...if I could turn the bass up some more on the Samsung it would be perfect. Not bad at all though for a true surround sound. 13 hours is great on this system. Bluetooth is awesome as well
179.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

180.author: Moviegoer
180.review_title: Great choice for all in one system!
180.review: I upgraded from an older samsung system and was quite pleased by the sound. I went from 600 to 1000 watts and it made a nice difference for my theater setup. The sync feature even made switching from TV to Blu-ray seamless. It also powers down with my TV when we turn in for the night. One touch- Awesome!
180.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

181.author: Surrndsoundnerd
181.review: Unfortunately I was unable to see the true performance of this product because it never worked. I was excited to unbox this system until I hooked it up and realized only 2 out of my 5 speakers were working. A disappointment to say the least.
181.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

182.author: MARK
182.review: Since I have a Samsung television, it made sense to get a Samsung DVD/sound system to go with it. It was easy to set up, and easy to make it work, and we love the results. The only thing I wish is it would be easier to mount the remote speakers. But all in all, for the price it's a wonderful system.
182.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

183.author: Newstart1
183.review: I could've chose a better TV this is great!! I love the size and how thin it is~ it's been wonderful!! The only thing is that I'm still trying to work out all the options that the TV offers and trying to learn each aspect of that with the channels and trying to learn everything about it, It has so much to offer!
183.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

184.author: r717
184.review_title: Good quality for an "in a box" system
184.review: The sound quality was good for the price. Not too "tinny" like the cheaper Samsung 500W system which I had previously. I had to adjust the sound levels to get it balanced properly. My only complaint is the proprietary plugs on the speaker cables is more of a nuisance than it is helpful.
184.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

185.author: Maybarbie
185.review: We really like the ease of set up and use of this system. I use the Bluetooth feature to stream music from my phone daily. The sound quality is great and we like the easy access to Amazon Video and Netflix, etc... Our kids can easily play their DVDs without assistance as well.
185.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

186.author: masekclan
186.review: I have actually been impressed by the capabilities of this media center considering it's in a box. I have had a few issues with certain disks playing but they appear to have been resolved with the latest firmware upgrade from Samsung. For someone on a budget, I would definitely recommend this surround sound system.
186.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

187.author: Russ
187.review: I am very impressed with this system, was skeptical while un boxing because the speakers are very small but the sound is truly awesome! The subwoofer although not powered, is very good. With this system you don't need a smart tv because it does it all.
187.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

188.author: Willy
188.review_title: Good entry level surround sound system
188.review: The Samsung is good for what you are getting. It produces good sound and is easy to understand the voices over the sometimes loud music/noise which is in the background of a lot of shows. The only problem I have with the unit is a very loud fan. I am thinking of returning it for that reason.
188.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

189.author: Tom244
189.review: The sound is like a good nightclub sound when listening to music. This is a fantastic unit for such a reasonable price. We have it for the TV in the living room. Now, I would prefer not watching the TV in the bedroom. I regret not having one for so long prior to getting this.
189.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

190.author: SueZQ1
190.review: I was disappointed in the system. This is a replacement for my old Home Theater system which was almost identical. The surround sound that comes from the rear speaker is so minimal. They were here 2 times to adjust it, but I'm not a happy camper. I kind of was forced into taking this system.
190.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

191.author: Rob1968
191.review_title: Excellent System for our Family Room
191.review: This system was perfect for the small size of our family room. Compact with great sound. My daughter and I watched Star Wars 3 last night. The vibration from the sub-woofer as we flew by massive ships, and clarity of the light saber fight screens, was absolutely fantastic!
191.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

192.author: Jwalt
192.review: If this was my first surround sound system, I would be extremely happy; however, I had an older model LG system, fully wired, prior to purchasing this system. I believe the rear speakers being separate from the main system greatly reduces its effectiveness. Otherwise everything else about the system is great!
192.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

193.author: BigTEXEP
193.review: Samsung always makes great products and this is no different. I especially love the wireless rear speakers. My old system had wires every where and this new one does not. I also love the apps I can access with the built WiFi. With this unit there is no need for a Smart TV or Chromecast.
193.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

194.author: JonButcher
194.review: Setup was easy and I appreciate the online connectivity. The Blu Ray and Online apps are the only great features. The speakers are moderate, not great. Good entry level system. Consumer grade meh! Not a real audio power punch!
194.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

195.author: ctoba
195.review_title: Good sound quality, good integration with Samsung
195.review:
The product is easy to install, good sound quality. HDMI and optical sound connection to the TV uplifts any show to surround sound quality.
I would have give it a 5 stars but . the controls for the volume are misplaced on the remote (two tiny + - buttons on the first row) and no volume control on the receiver itself.
195.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

196.author: ZinckMom
196.review: This is a great system for the price. I’ve seen reviews that state the rear speakers only work with certain media.. not true, it’s a setting. Have an issue? Most of the time it’s a setting issue. Sound is awesome, even though the speakers are small. Very happy!
196.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

197.author: sandidgec
197.review_title: Good Home Theatre System, few tweaks
197.review: This Samsung home theatre is great once it's set up and you work out the kinks. The biggest kink(s) that I had with it were the wires not making great connection with the speakers initially. I re-stripped the wires and then all the speakers worked great, before that they were spotty.. in and out.
197.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

198.author: choc0daeyul
198.review: You can never go wrong with Samsung. Sound works, and you can't tell if there is a lag with the back wireless speakers. Good clarity and good bold sound for what you pay for. My only beef is that there just too many remotes to keep track of. And sometime the face touch buttons can be unresponsive. Overall great.
198.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

199.author: Quikstrike7
199.review: Amazing sound from this system. Subwoofer is surprisingly powerful. Great features and Bluetooth link. Rear wireless speakers are great, except wire is a bit short to wireless receiver. Not much customization on sound but presets are pretty good.
199.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

200.author: Theran
200.review_title: Best for a good, not great audio experience
200.review: I've purchase 3-4 of these all-in-one Blu Ray home theater systems in the past 7 years or so from Best Buy. It appears that the older models we more better with more robust bass and midrange. The highs and dialogue are perfect. Maybe best for smaller rooms, mine is 20' x 20' x 20'.
200.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

201.author: Scoop
201.review: The condition of what we bought was supposed to be lightly used. This was not lightly used. It was heavily used without any power cord. We will return it and buy a new one somewhere else. No more used.
201.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

202.author: rderstin
202.review_title: Relatively easy to set up for non-techie
202.review: Works great. I'm now able to use the receiver portion of the Blu-Ray player to output sound from TV as well as DVDs. What an improvement in sound quality! One word of caution in connecting speaker wires to speakers. Do NOT insert 'entire' wire into speaker -- only the very last section.
202.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

203.author: xxplosive1323
203.review: Real good sound; works really good with Samsung TV; Redundant if you have a gaming system and/or smart TV. Speaker wire suggest a small room set up, as surround sound wires are not very long at all and not directly input to receiver (separate box allows for wireless speakers to be connected).
203.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

204.author: GOLDJR
204.review: Difficult to install even when connecting to a Samsung HDTV. The unit outputs to the peripheral channel inputs becomes confusing when switching sources with both the unit and TV inputs. The wireless rear surround speakers eliminates a lot of extra work during setup.
204.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

205.author: BBAddict
205.review: These aren't bad for what they are. The sound is pretty good. The set up is easy, the wires are even color coded for each speaker. But the wires aren't a great quality. When setting it up one of the speakers didn't work, it turned out to be a short in the wire had to move it around. The player is works great.
205.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

206.author: Eric
206.review: the "wireless" speakers don't work for many programs, it sounds like nothing is coming out of them. The bass is also not impressive/non-existent. The price is good and the system is easy to set up, but the quality is just not good enough for me,sorry.
206.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

207.author: Pranu
207.review:
It's worth for the price. One draw back is it has lot of wires. Otherwise it has a great sound, I really like the ability to connect to it via blue tooth with my smartphone. I am very pleased with the ease of install and the wireless rear speakers.
I recommend this one.
207.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

208.author: Dimples

210.author: Von4

212.author: sybestbs

However, the power cord for the wireless speakers box wasn't included. The instructions doesn't say it's included, but I'm not sure how that's supposed to work
212.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

213.author: s10tim
213.review: So far it works great, I mainly wanted it for the dvd up-scaling feature and it delivers. Also I upgraded to this model for the HDMI input to my Samsung smart tv because my old dvd-surround sound unit was using composite input and now I get true surround sound from the high def tv channels. I love it.
213.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

214.author: Horsewithnoname

214.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

215.author: Romparoomkev

216.review: Wireless speakers never works , sound doesn't come out of them , system has a timer and cuts off after so long , not loud at all and ive had it 1 year and now i have no sound at all ! Trash

217.author: Edrei321

218.author: TomFromBaltimore

Horrible. Do not buy this product.
I am an EE, one of the speaker wires out of the box was faulty, after replacing it, I still have no center sound. Great if you want to watch DVDs, not if you want to listen to them.
Going straight to the recycling, not even going to try to return it.
218.recommend: No, I would not recommend this to a friend

220.author: Milton
220.review_title: Really improves sound quality of TV.

221.author: GingerSnap

222.author: Jumbo

222.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

223.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

224.review: This system sounds pretty good, not a Bose home theater but still good. My only complaint is the design of the speakers. An oval shape will not sit properly against the wall. Definitely needs flats on the back of the speakers in order to hang with any stability.

225.author: Mary
225.review: Reasonable price for the options it has; apps, blue ray DVD player and usb capibility. It connects to your wi-fi and you can use your smartphone as a remote. Surround sound Speakers are excellent and great for small or large living room.
225.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

226.author: Chad

227.author: Tekes

227.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

228.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

This system was easy to set up and we are able to watch tv thru the system . Exactly what we were looking for.
229.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

230.author: Mike

230.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

231.author: Techman7
231.review_title: Sound is great and movies look amazing!

All though you can control both with the tv remote you can't power on or off with one. Don't get that at all.
231.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

233.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

234.author: paultechreview

Great system!

263.author: mickey

Sound quality - For the price, this is good
Buy the one that has Samsung Smart Hub and Opera TV

292.author: Anonymous

295.recommend: I would recommend this to a friend

297.author: Dinah
